website_summaries.verdict: For small tasks around the house, this little tool is worth considering – but it has longer battery life than it does power.
pros: Stands out for the built-in screw holder that allows you to work one-handed
Other features include a 6-bit cartridge and built-in LED light
Compact enough to work in small areas
cons: Doesn't deliver as much torque as some others we considered

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but not fully realized.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fan of the concept and found the screwdriver to be decent for lite duty applications. Pro: Pretty handy little screw driver. Rotating magazine of every day drill bits. The fastener holder is removable and it does have a light that may assist the right handed user. Cons: Unfortunately the handle is in my opinion exceptionally small which limits leverage. The bits are tiny and the fastener holder really does not provide sufficient grip. The light is on the left side and is blocked by the upper housing from which limits its use.
customer_reviews.author: DAlexius

customer_reviews.title: Great Drill for light duty tasks
customer_reviews.text: this screw driver is great for light duty work as the battery doesn’t last long and requires frequent charging. The screw driver itself has challenges when screwing in a screw in hardwood as it feels like it is about to stop working. The convenient automatic drill bit changer is a great idea as you don’t need to look around for various types of drills as these bits will do the job. I think this is a great addition to the kitchen draw for light work such as hanging pictures, etc and at the price you can’t go wrong. I will keep mine for those everyday projects that pop up.
customer_reviews.author: Nor'easter

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Convenient, Easy to Use.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the WORX WX255L after seeing the product while searching for a compact power screwdriver online. The idea of having a screwdriver that holds all of the bits I need was a major plus for me, but I was worried about how it would actually work when it came down to the operation. Definitely made right, very easy to switch between drill bits, and the cartridge is removable so that you can keep multiple for different jobs. Torque is exceptional, and the battery life is great. Lithium powered was absolutely a plus. Overall exceptional product, very sturdy, super easy to use. Good for a variety of tasks around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Bigelbach

customer_reviews.title: Light duty screwer
customer_reviews.text: The idea of this screw driver in that it holds the screw is a good one and is implemented well. However this has a number of short comings. First using the holding device prevents the screw from being screwed all the way into the wood as the screw holding arms are between the bottom of the screw head and the wood . Second it'll screw at a max 1" screws. For screws longer than that the power is not enough and the motor stalls. Third the trigger is an on/off function. Power drivers need to have variable speed so that the screw can start at a slower speed until it catches and then sped up. I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Get's The Job Done Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, but I actually have used it more. Great tool makes projects much easier. Easy to handle. Variety of bits. I installed door pulls on 16 laminate cabinets where previously no pulls existed. I used the WORX and got the job done quickly. A great addition for any DIY person.
customer_reviews.author: SCTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Easy to replace the bits
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for what it's designed for. Easy to replace the bits, in a very gun-like fashion (top pulls back like a pistol, then there's a revolver-like drum). The bit drum is removable for easy bit replacement, the screw holder is removable for working in tighter spaces, and it holds the charge for a surprisingly long time.
customer_reviews.author: MJ808

customer_reviews.title: - The charge lasts a very long time - Switching bits is a real joy, with the revolving action
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - When you have to go one handed the screw holder is a real asset. - The charge lasts a very long time - Switching bits is a real joy, with the revolving action. Cons: - In tight spaces, this drill isn't the best. This drill begs for a longer bits, so unfortunately this is not a one drill-fits-all tool. - you will find yourself taking off the screw holder a lot, because in most cases, holding a screw by hand is preferable. - under powered, if all your doing is putting together ikea furniture this will suite 80-85% of your needs, if you need to bore a hole in a 2x4, you should get a full sized drill.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence

customer_reviews.title: Best little portable power screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 6 of these now, giving 4 away. They are especially handy when working on things like light fixtures up on a ladder or other places where holding a screw and changing bits easily are big deals. I've got plenty of big & medium drivers by several major brands and some other small drivers, but this one is a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Ullman

customer_reviews.title: VERY Low Torque
customer_reviews.text: Have to screw in some small screws to hold an electrical outlet plate to the outlet? Good to go. Have any wood screws you need to drive in? Forget it! Even with pre-drilled holes, this thing doesn't have enough torque to drive in the screw. Even small wood screws present a challenge for this tool. The screw holder works, though.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Flinn

customer_reviews.title: I like the features
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a power screw driver for those times when I'm assembling a large project and have to drive a lot of screws. I looked at several different models and I'm delighted with this one. Changing screw heads is kind of like chambering a round on hand gun - same action. I had trouble getting it to work at first because the action is very stiff, but I suspect that it will loosen up a bit with use. I noticed that the action is pre-lubricated with machine oil, so that's not the problem. This driver just looks cool and it works well. Just don't let a police officer see you holding one!

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one of these in a drawer or tool box somewhere.

product_meta.title: WORX WX255L SD Semi-Automatic Power Screw Driver with Screw Holder
product_meta.description: Color:Original VersionThe WORX SD SemiAutomatic Driver with Screw Holder is the most convenient cordless screwdriver ever. Bits can be conveniently stored directly in the tool so they’re never lost. When it’s time to put the SD to work on a project, the slide-action lever advances the correct bit instantly. The SD is powered by an internal 4-Volt MAXLithium battery that gives you the power and battery life you need to get the job done quickly – fully charged, the battery will hold a charge for up to 18 months! The WORX SD accepts any standard 1/4” hex shank insert bit, so you can use most fasteners you already have. Just pull out the cartridge, pop in the bit you need and get working. The SD comes with six bits already loaded for the most common fastener types. The SD also has a detachable screw holder that holds the screw in place while driving it so you do not have to – with your hand free, you’re able to access tight spots easier. The screw holder even grabs hold of a screw as you back it out, so it doesn’t fall when it’s removed.
feature_bullets: Screw holder attachment holds screw so you can work with one hand free – also catches screws as they’re removed
Single-handed operation allows for extended reach; LED light provides increased visibility
Reloadable cartridge stores 6 bits directly in the tool – always have the right bit at hand!
Accepts any standard ¼” hex shank insert bit – rapid slide-action easily and quickly advances the correct bit
Powerful 4V MAX Lithium battery holds a charge for up to 18 months – charger included
